main event: An unidentified flying object was observed over San Antonio, Texas on 26 August 1951.
interesting points: The object was reported to be dark in color and of a very large size., The sighting lasted for only 10 seconds with no deviation from its course., The object was observed at a very high altitude and at a high rate of speed., No sound or odor was associated with the object during the sighting., The informant followed the object as it moved from south to northeast, indicating it was not a conventional type aircraft.
sighted object: large dark object in the sky
